title: Interaction Design Strategies in Self-Directed Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and foundational knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment utilizing digital devices, featuring a practice-oriented course to enhance language education expertise.

Learners enhance their ability to analyze language education cases through reflective writing activities based on blogs.
